name: SaiNathTereHazaroHath-IndianBhajan
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guru mantra
des:
Sai Baba of Shirdi, also known as Shirdi Sai Baba, was an Indian spiritual master who is regarded by his devotees as a saint and a fakir. He is revered by both his Hindu and Muslim devotees during, as well as after his lifetime.

Born: 28 September 1838
Died: 15 October 1918, Shirdi
Nationality: Indian
Buried: Sai Baba Samadhi Mandir, Shirdi

Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.
The life ahead can only be glorious if you learn to live in total harmony with the Lord.
You must pass your days in song. Let your whole life be a song.

Usage:
User: Alexa, open guru mantra
Alexa: Starting sai nath tere hazaro haath, you can say start or begin to play the audio.
User: Start
Alexa: <starts the audio>
Sai Nath Tere Hazaro Hath - Indian Bhajan
To add this to a daily timer, follow these steps:
1 - Open your Alexa App.
2 - Select Routines.
3 - Select Schedule, add a time (say 7 AM).
4 - Choose Skills / Your Skills.
5 - Choose “Sai Nath Tere Hazaro Hath - Indian Bhajan”. Done.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
